TopicTitle: Allow players to add their own ships to the main menu screen

Articles.Content:
Add an option, or automatic feature, that enables players to let their own creations spawn on the main menu screen. A variation of this idea could be to randomly select a spacecraft in orbit around a celestial body, and automatically generate a main menu screen featuring that craft. 
Another tangent - perhaps the pre-existing main menu crafts could be in orbit around other bodies in the various systems in KSP2. It would be amazing to see a space station orbit Jool, or Glumo on the main menu screen

That'd be a pretty cool feature

It could also work for landed craft, like bases or landers.
Maybe to reduce bugs and disappointment it would select craft in a specific size, so its not too small (like a single core probe) and not too big (like a station) that may crash the game on start-up
